title: 高阶Observable
author: 王宇
article:
高阶的Observable像是多维的概念

mergeAll
========

  

2000

2000  

1000

1000

1000

1000

Text

1000

1000

1000

1000

0:0

0:1

0:2

1:0

0:3

1:1

1:2

1:3

interval(2000).pipe(

  take(2),

  map(x\=>interval(1000).pipe(

    map(y\=>\`${x}: ${y}\`),

    take(4)

  )),

  mergeAll()

)
